aum_string_struct Struct Reference

#include <astum.h>


Data Fields

enum aum_string_charset charset
aum_string * next
size_t size
char * string

Detailed Description

String object for international strings.
Note:
Use the aum_string functions to assign values, get strings in alternative character sets and free the chain of strings OEJ: This is a simple linked list. Wonder if the AST_LIST is needed here?
